quote_first: Scott eased himself into the corner before once again checking the little sulphur dots on his watch. It was
quote_last: . He and Hannah had been in the safe for an hour and seventeen minutes.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: The line was surprisingly clear. A man introduced himself as Major Liepa from the Riga police. Wallander made notes as he listened, occasionally answering a question.
title: The Dogs of Riga
author: Henning Mankell
